00069 class SyncReport {
00070 
00071 private:

00074     int   lastErrorCode;
00075 
00076     // The error message of the last error occurred.
00077     char* lastErrorMsg;
00078

00085      * Function to initialize members.

00091      * @param sr the syncReport object
00092      */

00094

00097

00101     SyncReport(AbstractSyncConfig& config);
00102     virtual ~SyncReport();
00103

00157         return *this;
00158     }
